resources.string: You have to enter your API key!
There was an error, please try again!

In order to use this app and the awesome free service of Astrometry.net, you have to enter your personal API key.

You can find this key easily if you go the Astrometry.net website, login and go to Dashboard / My Profile. You API key is listed under "my API key" in green font.

Alternatively, follow this link and login to see your API key directly.
